title: Executive Order 6179-B-Abolition of the National Committee on Wood Utilization
content: There is hereby abolished The National Committee on Wood Utilization. All the property of every kind, files, and records, etc., belonging thereto are hereby transferred to the custody of the Secretary of Commerce for such disposition as he may determine; provided, that if the forest products industries desire to continue, in their own quarters and at their own expense, the work heretofore performed by the National Committee on Wood Utilization, the Secretary of Commerce may permit them to have access to or the use of the records and files of the Committee.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6179-B-Abolition of the National Committee on Wood Utilization Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361999
